title: Registration is Open!
content: Sign up now for this year's Decoupled Drupal Days. Two days of speakers with three tracks of great talks. A great Happy Hour on Saturday and code sprinting on Sunday. Don't miss out!

title: Sponsorship opprotunites still available.
content: We're actively looking for sponsors who are interested in supporting Decoupled Drupal Days to distinguish themselves as experts in the decoupled Drupal space, to recruit expertise in the field, or to advocate for open-source technologies. Would Gastby be interested in supporting our conference? Please find attached a prospectus for your convenience.
